Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const("Item Entry")) "Item Ledger Entry" else
            if ("Source Type" = const("Job Entry")) "Job Ledger Entry" else
            if ("Source Type" = const("FA Entry")) "FA Ledger Entry"

Properties.Name: TableRelation
Properties.Value:
if ("Source Type" = const("Item Entry")) Item else
            if ("Source Type" = const("Job Entry")) Item else
            if ("Source Type" = const("FA Entry")) "Fixed Asset"

Properties.Name: TableRelation

if ("Intrastat Contact Type" = const(Contact)) Contact."No." else
            if ("Intrastat Contact Type" = const(Vendor)) Vendor."No."

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the month to report data for. Enter the period as a four-digit number, with no spaces or symbols. Enter the year first and then the month, for example, enter 1706 for June, 2017

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies a code that identifies the currency of the Intrastat report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Recalculate weight and/or supplemental units quantity.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Release the document to the next stage of processing. You must reopen the document before you can make changes to it.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Reopen the document to change it after it has been approved. Approved documents have the Released status and must be opened before they can be changed.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of the table field that this entry in the checklist uses.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the name of the table field that this entry in the checklist uses.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the filter expression that must be applied to the Intrastat line. The check for fields is run only on the lines that meet the filter criteria.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies that the check for fields is run only on those lines that do not match the filter expression. If the line is not filtered, this field is ignored.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the filter expression that must be applied to the Intrastat line where field must be blank. The check for fields is run only on the lines that meet the filter criteria.

Properties.Value: Rec."Must Be Blank For Filter Expr."

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Intrastat Report Setup is used to enable intrastat reporting and set defaults for it. You can specify whether you need to report Intrastat from shipments (dispatches), receipts (arrivals) or both depending on thresholds set by your local regulations. You can also set default transaction types for regular and return documents, used for nature of transaction reporting.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: Choose Next to specify basic Intrastat reporting info.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText
Properties.Value: All VAT Reports Configuration records for Intrastat Report will be removed during the process.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if drop shipment transactions are included in Intrastat reports.

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how the company's VAT registration number exports to the Intrastat file. 0 is the value of the VAT Reg. No. field, 1 adds the EU country code as a prefix, and 2 removes the EU country code.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how a vendor's VAT registration number exports to the Intrastat file. 0 is the value of the VAT Reg. No. field, 1 adds the EU country code as a prefix, and 2 removes the EU country code.
